definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Phil removed his old furniture from the house and took it to the dump.
sentences.chinese: 菲尔清除厂屋内的旧家具并拿到垃圾场去丢厂。

sentences.english: The room was encumbered with old furniture.
sentences.chinese: 这间屋子堆满了旧家具。

sentences.english: Use only stuff you have around the house or found items like shells or old furniture.
sentences.chinese: 只用你在房子周围能找到的材料像是贝壳或者旧家具。

sentences.english: Therefore, if you want to renovate your old home then don?
sentences.chinese: 因此，如果你想你的旧家翻新，然后穿上？

sentences.english: You can often scavenge nice bit of old furniture from skip.
sentences.chinese: 从废物堆里往往能捡到一些挺好的旧家具。

sentences.english: They are selling some of their old furniture in front of their apartment.
sentences.chinese: 在他们住的公寓前，他们在出售一些旧家具。

sentences.english: An expert will evaluate the old furniture in this house.
sentences.chinese: 一个行家将会估计这屋内旧家具的价格。

sentences.english: I stored up the old furniture in the warehouse.
sentences.chinese: 我把旧家具存放在了仓库里。

sentences.english: Let's get rid of this moldy old furniture.
sentences.chinese: 我们把这件老掉牙的旧家具抛弃吧。

sentences.english: Must be selling off some old furniture.
sentences.chinese: 准是出售什么旧家具来了。

sentences.english: It will cost considerable time to lacquer the old furniture.
sentences.chinese: 油漆旧家具要花相当多时间。

sentences.english: He will expose his old furniture for sale at public auction .
sentences.chinese: 公开拍卖时他会把他的旧家具陈列出来的。

sentences.english: She bargained eagerly for this old furniture.
sentences.chinese: 他急切地想以低价买到这件旧家具。

sentences.english: Quite often, cracks in old furniture arise from failed glue joints.
sentences.chinese: 通常，旧家具会开裂，产生失败的胶接头。

sentences.english: They worked over the old furniture.

definition: old property (esp. inherited from former generation)/former territory
old and respected family/family whose members have been officials from generation to generation
to live in a foreign place/to live somewhere as a guest
couplet (hung on each side of the door frame)
